name: Truck and Roll
description:
Welcome to Truck and Roll - We deliver packages, some might even make it!

The Truck and Roll truck is broken, all it can do is roll down the hill to the delivery location.  Stack up the truck and let it go - but beware, any packages that fall out will have a penalty, so overstacking is not always the best thing to do.

Some packages need to be delivered to Blue Inc along the way, you'll need to grab these off the truck and drop them as you go past - big rewards, but big penalties if you fail to deliver them!

This game was made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020
